en_title: Secretary for Justice to attend dispute resolution conference in Seoul
zh_title: 律政司司長前赴首爾出席糾紛解決會議

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Seoul, Korea, from October 11 to 12 to attend the 5th Asia Pacific ADR Conference, an international conference on dispute resolution.

The conference is jointly hosted by the United Nations Commission on International Trade Law Regional Office for Asia and the Pacific, the Ministry of Justice of the Republic of Korea, the Korean Commercial Arbitration Board, the International Chamber of Commerce and the Seoul International Dispute Resolution Center. The theme of the conference this year is the future development of arbitration.
Mr Yuen will speak at a session on "Arbitration for 50 Years & 50 Years Ahead - Innovation for Efficiency & Legitimacy" on October 12.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong on the evening of October 12.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師將於十月十一至十二日訪問韓國首爾，出席「第五屆亞太替代性糾紛解決機制大會」。
大會是有關糾紛解決的國際會議，由聯合國國際貿易法委員會亞洲及太平洋區域中心、韓國法務部、韓國商事仲裁院、國際商會和首爾國際爭議解決中心聯合主辦，今年的主題是展望仲裁的未來發展。
袁國強將於十月十二日在「回顧與展望仲裁五十年—創新效率與合法性」的環節上發表演講。
袁國強將於十月十二日晚上返港。
